A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Complicated\, with turns that are both unpredictable and seemingly dismissive of the work done in the force awakens.  At the same time it is fun\, technically excellent\, and worth repeat viewings.  Judging the second act of the trilogy without the third will mean many choices are not going to be fully understood\, but I for one am very interested to see where we go from here.
